tasks.label: Restart server
tasks.command: powershell -NoProfile -Command "Get-Process node -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Stop-Process -Force; node server.js"

tasks.label: Preview server (dev)
tasks.command: powershell -NoProfile -Command "if (Test-Path .\node_modules) { $env:PORT=8080; node server.js } else { Write-Host 'Install deps with npm i first' }"
